body.name: FANimal Portable Small Stroller Fan for Baby-Mini Handheld Personal Fan-Rechargeable Clip on USB Fan-Stroller Accessories-Night Light for Kids (Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: BRAND NEW EYE-CATCHING CUTE DESIGN - FANimal portable small stroller fan boasts a brand new eye-catching design for you and your loved ones. Made of upgraded bendable metal and silicone surface, more durable and easier to clean, flexible and firm to fit your needs in any versatile way. Handheld fan, portable fan, small fan, personal fan, stand as a small desk fan, hanging or winding as a wall clip on fan, even as a phone holder.

360 DEGREE ROTATIONAL AND 4 WIND SPEEDS – Fan can be adjusted vertically and horizontally in any direction, to create the perfect cooling breeze as a cooling fan; it comes with 4 speeds, powerful yet quiet.

MULTI-COLORED LED LIGHTS - Keep your baby busy with automatically changing and stimulating multi-colored LED light. It can be used as a clip fan for toddler bed or baby crib, carriage fan, or baby carseat fans to keep your baby happy. Also perfect to use as night lights for kids with added benefit of cool breeze.

PORTABLE AND RECHARGEABLE – Portable stroller fan rechargeable fan battery operated fan and comes with 3000mAh battery, lasts 4.5-15 hours depending on wind speed. Battery powered fan that supports USB-C charging via power bank, laptop, or any power source with USB output. It can also be used as a travel fan. Must have for you and your kids' outdoor adventures.
FANimal can be one of your baby essentials for newborn and baby must haves!
Perfect gift for you, your family and friends!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have, cute fan!!
reviews.reviewText: Works well, easy to attach to things. The legs move easily. The fan has good power. It is a must have when traveling. Long battery life, you can use it for a long time. It is also quite so you can use at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this fan
reviews.reviewText: I love this to put on my table next to my bed for a little cool breeze . I bought 2 and I want more. It will last all night on the slow speed and without the charger. I also use in the kitchen window to blow in some air or out . I have dropped it out of the 2nd fl window 3 times and it didnt break! Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crazy Cat Lady
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Honestly, I love this cat fan. I am a very warm person, and can’t stand the heat. I’m also a crazy cat lady. If it’s cat shaped or a cat design, I must own it. So I was looking for a little fan to put by my bed at night, and I came across this! I was iffy on buying due to some of the reviews, but I ended up saying “eh if it don’t work, it’s still cute!” Well, to my luck, it works, and it works way more efficiently than I expected. It’s not what I would consider “quiet” but it’s not loud either. It would be cool if it could oscillate, but being able to angle this how ever is well worth the trade. Upon receiving this fan, I did turn it on and test all features, they all worked. I did let the fan run until it died before charging, it lived for almost 4 hours, and the charge took roughly 5 hours. It then ran for 8-9 hours on the second setting. Long hold the button for lights on, long hold to turn them off. Fan does not have to be running for the LED lights to be turned on. The 4th setting is like a constant up and down ramp setting, I’m not much of a fan for that one. But the first setting is perfect for me at night. I took this fellow to the board walk for 4th of July fire works and it securely stayed in place on the rails where I sat! On the 3rd setting, outside , it was perfect! I’m disappointed I didn’t buy the pink one as well! I highly recommend for a cat lover, a kid, or someone who needs a convenient little fan that can attach to pretty much anything !! 10 out of 10! Worth the price worth the buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is very easy to use. The fan is quiet and very cute my kids love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small portable fan perfect for on the go and for home.
reviews.reviewText: Small portable fan for on the go and for home.It had a flexible stand that can also wrap around practically anything.Love that it has four different wind speeds and that it rotates 360 degrees.Also very quiet, and is cordless with a separate charger.Would definitely recommend for honestly anyone its good for kids and adults.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and effective
reviews.reviewText: It’s adorable and works great. Keeps a charge for hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for desk workers/pc gamers
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my coworker who always complains about how hot her office gets because her desk is right next to a big window and it gets pretty hot all the time. So I thought this portable fan that looks like a kitty would be perfect for her because she loves cats too haha anyway I like how strong the fan is considering its size and it's pretty quiet too and the flexible legs can hold on to pretty much anything. I will definitely buy another one for me when i play games at home but I just wish it comes in different color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong, Quiet, Cute
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing. Love how you can twist the legs so it’s easy to go on a chair, car seat, anything! The power to this little thing is just great! The battery last quite a while. Get it!
